mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_lost_found (item_name, description, contact, lost_type, status, visitor_name, create_time, geom) VALUES (#{itemName}, #{description}, #{contact}, #{lostType}, 0, #{visitorName}, NOW(), ST_Transform(ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{longitude}, #{latitude}), 4326), 3857))
mapper.select: SELECT id, item_name AS itemName, description, contact, lost_type AS lostType, status, visitor_name AS visitorName, create_time AS createTime, ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_Transform(geom, 4326)) AS geometry FROM sys_lost_found WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
